summary: I WAS DRIVING AND I STEPPED ON THE BRAKES TO TURN THE CORNER, AND THEY MADE AN AIR RELEASING NOISE AND DID NOT SLOW ME DOWN, THEY WENT COMPLETELY OUT! I HAVE BRAND NEW BRAKES. I TOOK IT TO THE REPAIR SHOP AND IT WAS THE BRAKE BOOSTER SYSTEM. THANK GOD THIS HAPPENED IN A PARKING LOT AND NOT ON THE STREET!
